--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: If this is turned into a T.V. show I could have convinced them 
to

> Epyon"  BUT THERE'S NO WAY NOW THAT YOU'RE STARTING A NEW FACTION 
> IT'LL BE CALLED "Quasacons" predictibly.
>

> > The place was dark, lit only by some computer monitors. Also, this 
> was 
> > a space station, and at this time of the night, lights were 
usually 
> > not all bright and sparkle. The other reason was because the 
> commander 
> > of the base considered it shook claustrophobia out of his troops.
> > 
> > The commander was a huge robot. He was the leader of the 
Quasacons, 
> a 
> > highly recognized Sadisticon unit in the Predacon ranks. He held 
> them 
> > with an iron grip and would never accept their disobeyance. 
However,

> > themselves. He was a tough commander, not a tyrant.

> orders 
> > and we all get ready now!
> >
